Class MvtRecognition

The MvtRecognition class. Contains all the methods to detect and analyze movements.

  • initiateValues: Initiate the different values of the class.
  • CheckIfMvtIsRight: Compare the movements made by the user with the one he should reproduce.
  • checkBeginningMvt: Check if the user is doing the beginning of a movement.
  • changeColorUICharacter: Change the color of the character attached to the UI.
  • launchComparison: Exist in two versions, used to compare the user position and a frame of a bvh file.

Syntax
public class MvtRecognition : MonoBehaviour
Remarks

The Start() and Update() methods are used, it might be a good idea to do the processing on another file.

Methods

LaunchComparison(BvhNode, Bvh, Int32, String[], Int32)

Compare the position of the actor and a frame of animationToCompare.

Declaration
public bool LaunchComparison(BvhNode root, Bvh animationToCompare, int degOfMargin, string[] bodyPartsToIgnore, int frame)
Parameters
Type Name Description
BvhNode root

The BvhNode from which we want to compare the movement.
Bvh animationToCompare

The bvh which contain the movement to compare.
System.Int32 degOfMargin

The margin angle with which the user can make the movement.
System.String[] bodyPartsToIgnore

An array of strings containing the names of the parts of the body that we do not want to compare in the movement. The following list show some valid examples:

System.Int32 frame

The index of the frame to look.
Returns
Type Description
System.Boolean

The result of the comparison (true or false)
Examples
if(launchComparison(bvhHand, bvh, 40, new []{ "Leg","Spine2" },23))
{
    Debug.Log("The movements of the hand are corresponding.");
}

LaunchComparison(BvhNode, Bvh, Int32, String[], Int32, Func<BvhNode, Boolean, Int32>)

Compare the position of the actor and a frame of animationToCompare, and launch a function for every node.

System.Func<BvhNode, System.Boolean, System.Int32> functionCalledAtEveryNode
